spec_data.Name: texlive-greek-fontenc
spec_data.Description:
The package provides Greek LICR macro definitions and encoding
definition files for Greek text font encodings for use with
fontenc.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:20:57 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: LICR macros and encoding definition files for Greek
